caption.p: Impacts of CO 2, temperature and aphid presence on root nodulation (number per plant) of M. sativa when growing in (A) non-supplemented and (B) Si supplemented soil. Mean values ± standard error shown ( N = 20) with statistically significant effects indicated ∗ P < 0.05, ∗∗ P < 0.01, and ∗∗∗ P < 0.001. Significant factors shown as per Figure 1 legend.
